thread.title: Two air hostesses ‘molested’ on-board Jet Airways Mumbai-Nagpur flight | The Indian Express
thread.title_full: Two air hostesses ‘molested’ on-board Jet Airways Mumbai-Nagpur flight | The Indian Express

author: Express Web Desk
title: Two air hostesses ‘molested’ on-board Jet Airways Mumbai-Nagpur flight | The Indian Express

organizations.name: indian express online media pvt ltd

text:
Two air hostesses ‘molested’ on-board Jet Airways Mumbai-Nagpur flight Two air hostesses ‘molested’ on-board Jet Airways Mumbai-Nagpur flight The incident reportedly took place when the air hostesses were serving him his in-flight meal. By: Express Web Desk | New Delhi | Published:February 27, 2017 9:47 am The incident took place on-board a Mumbai-Nagpur flight. 
Two air hostess of a Mumbai-Nagpur Jet Airways flight were allegedly molested on Saturday. A written complaint was submitted to the flight captain against the accused – a 23-year-old hardware trader. 
According to The Times of India, the accused – Akash Gupta – was handed over to the CISF on landing, and he has been charged with section 354 – outraging the modesty of a woman. 
The incident reportedly took place when the air hostesses were serving him his in-flight meal. He reportedly grabbed their hands forcing them to seek help from the cabin crew members. © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
